name: @rainstormy/preset-eslint-jsx
description: A predefined, opinionated ESLint configuration intended to be used as a foundation for any web project that uses the JSX syntax for components.
author: Steffen Diswal

dependencies.eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y: An ESLint plugin that covers the accessibility of JSX- and React-like components.
dependencies.eslint-plugin-react: An ESLint plugin that covers JSX- and React-like components.

devDependencies.@types/eslint: A set of type definitions for ESLint configuration files.
devDependencies.typescript: A statically typed programming language that extends the JavaScript syntax.

peerDependencies.eslint: A static program analysis tool that uncovers code issues.
